string-array.name: news
string-array.item:
* New Feature: you can clik on player in player overview to
 * see all Tournaments the player was involved before.
 * Only games from finished tournaments are uploaded for players.
 * First data is only the name of the participants more will come.
* Improved upload army list \n * delete uploaded army list now possible \n * fixed bug ongoing tournament that you can do next round again.
* New Feature: upload armyLists for games \n * fix big label issues. They are now limited and end with dots
* New Feature: undo tournament round \n * fix view for small device \n * fix issue wth dummy player
* New Feature: delete local player + tournament player counter\n * fix adding local players\n * fix team tournament cp + vp calculation.
* New Feature: swap player with button \n * fix crash team tournament with no player/teams.\n * fix bug creating local players -> now stored again in local db.
* Fix wrong determination of tournament state and round\n * fix issue creating team tournament

* Improve mobile layout for tournament organization
 * Many Fixed Labels
 * New "teamView" for organized Tournaments -> Teamtournament preparation
 * new Feature TeamTournaments!
 * Check if player already in tournament (name check)
 * space saving in tournament player visualization
 * better mobile view for tournament organization
 * Bug with registrations. Registration now has header!
 * input bug when use keyboard in game result entering
 * final standings should be correct now

* Fix bug in calendar
 * New "teamView" for organized Tournaments -> Teamtournament preparation
 * Bug with registrations. Registration now has header!

* New "News" Section
 * New Starting View design
 * Label for DEMO version
 * Many Bug Fixes -> Thanks to all alpha Testers!
 * Shortcut button to organized Tournaments from online Tournaments
